awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences:  Seminar on Stochastic Processes
awd_abstract_narration: 9317561  This award provides funds to partially support the 1994 Seminar on Stochastic Processes  to be held at Texas A&M University. It will be the latest in a successful series of annual  seminars begun in 1981 giving eminent researchers and young specialists the opportunity  to work together in discussing the state of the art in stochastic analysis, potential theory  and Markov processes. For young researcher this presents an invaluable opportunity to  showcase their work as well as to learn from the senior members of the audience.
